page.title: 16The Vets of Tregony
page.content: In Tregony there are two vets who cover the area of six square km. In a normal day he will start by going round to a local dairy farm and give the farmer advice following the outbreak of diseases like Foot and Mouth, Bovine T.B., Laminitis, Mastitis and Worms. He will then go back and hold a two hour surgery, dealing mainly with people's pets but he sometimes deals with farm animals during the surgery session. In the Winter and Spring he will often have to go to a farm, three or four times a night to deliver calves and see that they are healthy. The vets in this area deal mainly with prophylactic medicine which aims to prevent disease by vaccinating and careful monitoring of animal welfare.
